channel.title: Getting Started on SQL Components
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on SQL Components

item.title: Installation
item.description: In order to generate the code at compiletime, SQLComponents has to be added as a build plugin ( under build > plugins in pom.

item.title: Connection
item.description: We need configure SQLComponents to connect to the database instance. we should create a file named sql-components.yml as given below
